author: prashraj
title: Hyderabad-Tirupati-Chennai-Puducherry
text: # 1 Dear friends, I am writing after a long time, and again coming to you for advice.I am planning a holiday from 30th Dec to 6th Jan, 2016. Here is my planned schedule 30th Dec: Reach Hyderabad 31st Dec: Leave to Tirupati by Train in the evening (12797 Venkatadri Exp) 1 st Jan: After Darshans leave to chennai. 2nd Jan: Start for Pondy via East Coastal Road, 2nd Jan to 6th Jan- stay at Pondy 6th Jan: reach Chennai airport. Please help in finding hotel at Hyderabad and Chennai, as well as Taxi from Chennai to Pondy.In pondy I am going to stay at The Retreat Guest House. My budget is moderate. A lot of thanks in advance. Please reply.
